resources.string: Click on the \'+\' button to select the app you want to target.
Click on the \'+\' button to select the activity to fuzz.
Click on the \'+\' button to select what happens when we succeed. You will get options to choose if it opens a new ativity, shows a toast or stays in the same activity
What happens if an attempt fails?
Click on the \'+\' button to select what happens when an ateempt fails. You will get options to choose if it opens a failure activity, shows a toast or stays in the same activity

Click on the \'RECON\' button and open the screen of your app which contains the input fields you want to target. Our service will scan the screen and let you know when we finish through a toast. Once it is finished, you can come back to this app and click \'Next >\'
Click on the \'+\' button to select the input fields you want to fuzz. We will show you the fields we found during ther previous RECON step.

Click on the \'START\' button and open the screen of your target app containing the input fields and we will start running the fuzzer. You can stop the fuzzer by coming back to this app and clicking on \'STOP\' button.
